nio/LocalPublisher.description: Sends signals within the same instance to the configured topic.
nio/LocalPublisher.tags: send publish topic structure message messaging dot hierarchy

nio/LocalSubscriber.description: Receives signals within the same instance from the configured topic.
nio/LocalSubscriber.tags: receive subscribe topic structure message messaging dot hierarchy

nio/Publisher.description: Sends incoming signals to the configured topic.
nio/Publisher.tags: send publish topic structure message messaging json pickle dot hierarchy

nio/Subscriber.description: Receives signals from the configured topic.
nio/Subscriber.tags: receive subscribe topic structure message messaging json pickle dot hierarchy
